body.name: Jeep PowerGlyde Stroller by Delta Children - Lightweight Travel Stroller with Smoothest Ride & Compact Fold, 3-Position Recline, Extra Large Storage Basket, Olive Green
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 2 mins
features: SMOOTHEST RIDE: Swivel front wheels feature precision technology for outstanding control and effortless push, it’s easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface | Locking back brakes | Puncture-proof 6-inch tires are durable and shock absorbing
LIGHTWEIGHT: The ultimate in convenience, this lightweight stroller has a durable steel frame that only weighs 13.7 lbs. | Comfortable 43" stroller height is ideal for all parents
COMPACT FOLD: The easy compact umbrella fold with carry handle and auto latch lock Is ideal for travel or everyday use | Folded dimensions: 9.5"L x 6.7"W x 41.7"H | Meets theme park size requirements

DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: Keep your child comfortable with optimal support in all 3 recline positions | Oversized canopy with extendable sun visor has UPF 50+ protection | Stroller has plenty of storage with its extra-large storage basket and cup holder

SAFE OPTION: JPMA certified; meets or exceeds and ASTM and CPSC standards | 5-point safety harness | Reflective shoulder pads | Recommended for ages 9 months up to 50 lbs. | Assembled dimensions: 33.9"L x 18.5"W x 41.3"H
body.description: Wherever the road takes you, the Jeep PowerGlyde Stroller by Delta Children will deliver the best ride ever. The Jeep PowerGlyde offers the most advanced handling thanks to all-new front wheels that feature precision technology, making it easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface. Ideal for travel or everyday use, this lightweight stroller with a durable steel frame weighs under 14 pounds and features a compact umbrella fold with an auto lock design and carry handle. An extra-large extendable canopy with UPF 50+ sun visor will protect your child from the elements and a three-position reclining seat ensures baby is comfortable during walks, near and far. Some additional features of this lightweight stroller include: five-point safety harness, extra-large storage basket, parent cup holder and swivel front wheels. This stroller is recommended for infants 9 months up to 50 pounds. Let's glyde!Since 1941, the Jeep brand has been a symbol of freedom and expression. Influenced by a love of the great outdoors, Jeep kids' Products are created for little adventurers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, easy to fold /unfold
reviews.reviewText: This travel stroller exceeded my expectations! Its easy fold/unfold feature makes it incredibly convenient for both travel and daily use. The lightweight design is perfect for toddlers, and the overall quality is impressive. Assembling the stroller is a breeze, making it a hassle-free choice for parents on the go. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to fold and store
reviews.reviewText: I love this stroller! It's easy to push around, pivots nicely. It's light as they come with an easy grip handle and a sun shade. Fits nicely in my trunk lying down and if I stand it up in the back. It's nice and comfy for the baby too. Comes with a cup holder and decent under storage. Not good for babies who cannot sit up/hold posture/ hold their heads up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this stroller for a plane ride. Super easy to set up from the box. Folded up nicely but not compact. Easy to close and open quickly for getting on the bus from the parking lot, to the security line, and finally to be checked at the gate. Have used it a couple times since and it’s smaller than my uppababy. It was totally worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband just put this together and I’m glad I picked this one! It’s easy to pack up and has a sturdy side latch to keep it closed. It leans back by pushing a latch on both sides and the seat is simply pushed up in the back to get your child upright again. The cup holder seems sturdy and it expands to various cup sizes which is a plus.Overall I am so happy with the purchase, especially after going to Walmart and not seeing anything that was A. Great price B. Sturdy C. Added Features

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 2.5 year old daughter for our up coming trip to NYC. I wanted something compact and easy to fold when we use the subways. This stroller size is in between a compact umbrella stroller and a regular stroller. So it’s not super small or too bulky.The quality is great and easy to put together. It probably took me 5 minutes to install everything. It seems to be well built, sturdy, and drives really smooth. I have only used it inside the house so far so I can’t attest to how it will do in different terrains. It weighs about 15lbs and has a handle on the side for easy carrying.Super easy to fold and the back is able to go down during nap time. It has a good size canopy for sun coverage. It has a small basket at the bottom you probably can fit a few small items or medium size purse. I don’t think you will be able to fit a full size baby bag.I’m not impressed about the cup holder, it is small and won’t be able to hold a water bottle. It will hold a standard milk bottle, but nothing bigger than that. The height is another issue for me. I’m 5’1’’ on a good day and my husband is 5’10’’ so finding a stroller has always been a challenge. The handle is too high for me, but fits him well. So, I would say this stroller will be more comfortable for taller people. Another issue I have is the back at its most forward position is slightly inclined. I wish it can go forward another 1-2inches but it’s not a deal breaker.Overall, I’m pretty happy and I think this stroller will be small enough for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best car I've ever bought. Light and comfortable for my toddler.My 2-year-old son has been able to walk and sleep peacefully, the stroller reclines, has a bottle holder, opens and closes easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor customer service
reviews.reviewText: Front wheels would not stay on tried to call and find out if I was doing something wrong but but it took 10 days for them to respond and still was just an email that didn’t answer the question. So just returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, easy to handle...
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is easy operation for travel and storing in car. It was a little tricky getting the handlebars screwed in with the supplied Allen wrench. So used another tool at home, which worked quickly to attach them.
